unescape.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_UNESCAPE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_UNESCAPE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // unescape.hpp
00011

00018 
00019 #include <cassert>
00020 
00021 #include <boost/config.hpp> // for BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME
00022 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_adaptor.hpp>
00023 //#include <boost/iterator/iterator_traits.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/pointee.hpp>
00025 
00026 namespace boost { 
00027 namespace archive {
00028 namespace iterators {
00029 
00031 // class used by text archives to translate char strings to wchar_t
00032 // strings of the currently selected locale
00033 template<class Derived, class Base>
00034 class unescape 
00035     : public boost::iterator_adaptor<
00036         unescape<Derived, Base>,
00037         Base, 
00038         BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME pointee<Base>::type,
00039         single_pass_traversal_tag,
00040         BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME pointee<Base>::type
00041     >
00042 {
00043     friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00044     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::iterator_adaptor<
00045         unescape<Derived, Base>, 
00046         Base, 
00047         BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME pointee<Base>::type,
00048         single_pass_traversal_tag,
00049         BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME pointee<Base>::type
00050     > super_t;
00051 
00052     typedef unescape<Derived, Base> this_t;
00053     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME super_t::reference reference_type;
00054 public:
00055     // gcc 3.4.1 - linux required that this be public
00056     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME super_t::value_type value_type;
00057 private:
00058 
00059     reference_type dereference_impl() {
00060         if(! m_full){
00061             m_current_value = static_cast<Derived *>(this)->drain();
00062             m_full = true;
00063         }
00064         return m_current_value;
00065     }
00066 
00067     reference_type dereference() const {
00068         return const_cast<this_t *>(this)->dereference_impl();
00069     }
00070 
00071     // value_type is const char - can't be const fix later
00072     value_type m_current_value;
00073     bool m_full;
00074 
00075     void increment(){
00076         ++(this->base_reference());
00077         dereference_impl();
00078         m_full = false;
00079     };
00080 
00081 public:
00082 
00083     unescape(Base base) : 
00084         super_t(base),
00085         m_full(false)
00086     {}
00087 
00088 };
00089 
00090 } // namespace iterators
00091 } // namespace archive
00092 } // namespace boost
00093 
00094 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_UNESCAPE_HPP
